## Model PCA
##### Looking into the dimension
```{r}

PCA_model <- PCA(sampled_numerical, ncp=2,
                 scale.unit=TRUE, graph=F)
```

#### Checking for amount of variance retained by each principal component
```{r}
eigen_values <- get_eigenvalue(PCA_model)
print(eigen_values)
```

#### Graph of stdev explanation
```{r}
scree_plot <- fviz_screeplot(PCA_model, ylim=c(0, 10), addlabels=T) 
scree_plot
```

#### PCA Model run using k-means algorithm
```{r}
PCA_result <- get_PCA_var(PCA_model)
set.seed(1715)
PCA_km <- kmeans(PCA_result$coord, centers=5, nstart=25)
groups <- as.factor(PCA_km$cluster)
```

#### Plot biplot
```{r}
fviz_PCA_var(PCA_model, col.var=groups, legend.title="Cluster")
rm(accidents_df, sampled_numerical, scree_plot,eigen_values, groups, PCA_model, PCA_result, PCA_km)
```
